name: nuonce
description: Nuanced implementation of 'once' functionality, optimized for node.js
keywords: once, single, function, call, run, node

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run -s test && npm run -s checkStyle
scripts.benchmarks: (INFO=1 npm run -s benchmark1call0props && npm run -s benchmark50calls0props && npm run -s benchmark1call3props && npm run -s benchmark50calls3props) > ./reports/benchmarks.txt
scripts.postbenchmarks: cat ./reports/benchmarks.txt && echo '' && echo 'Benchmark results saved to `reports/benchmarks.txt`'
scripts.checkStyle: eslint *.js > ./reports/eslint.txt || echo 'ESLint results saved to `reports/eslint.txt`' && cat ./reports/eslint.txt
scripts.postcheckCoverage: mv ./coverage ./reports/coverage && echo Coverage results saved to '`reports/coverage/index.html`'

author: Marcin Konicki (https://ahwayakchih.neoni.net)
